feature_engineering module¶

class feature_engineering.FeatureEngineering(timeframes: List[str] | None = None)[source]¶

Bases : object

Calcul vectorisé d’indicateurs techniques et extraction de features dérivées pour pipeline ML. Support multi-timeframe, API flexible, pas d’IO (purement transformation DataFrame).

add_features(df: DataFrame, price_col: str = 'close', volume_col: str = 'volume', prefix: str = '') → DataFrame[source]¶

Ajoute des features dérivées (retours, volatilité, ratios, etc).

add_indicators(df: DataFrame, price_col: str = 'close', high_col: str = 'high', low_col: str = 'low', volume_col: str = 'volume', prefix: str = '') → DataFrame[source]¶

Ajoute les indicateurs techniques principaux au DataFrame OHLCV.

multi_timeframe(dfs: Dict[str, DataFrame], price_col: str = 'close', high_col: str = 'high', low_col: str = 'low', volume_col: str = 'volume') → DataFrame[source]¶

Fusionne et concatène les features multi-timeframe (clé = timeframe, valeur = DataFrame OHLCV).

bitcoin_scalper
